item.title: Electronic Modular Pegboard
item.description: Greeting! This is an introduction post. This post tests the followings: Hero image is in the same directory as the post. This post should be at top of the sidebar. Post author should be the same as specified in author.yaml file.

item.title: Eye Gaze-based User Interface
item.description: This is a sample post intended to test the followings: A different post author. Table of contents. Markdown content rendering. Math rendering. Emoji rendering. Markdown Syntax Rendering Headings The following HTML <h1>â€”<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is the highest section level while <h6> is the lowest.
